ernie the "Barrister" was a shrewd lawyer and representative for adventurers in the planar city of Sigil
In the month of Hammer, in the , a group of adventurers from Ravens Bluff found themselves transported to the plane of Carceri after defending the githzerai fortress of TahDarr from a tanarri incursion. There they met the fallen paladin Elendil, who knew a good deal about trade in Sigil and was willing to tell the adventurers the names of many reputable business folk that lived there, such as Bernie.
